q: Neurons communicate using electrical impulses and chemical _____.
The autonomic system includes the sympathetic (“fight or flight”) and _____ (“rest and digest”) branches.
The PNS connects the CNS to limbs and organs and is further divided into the somatic (voluntary actions) and autonomic nervous systems (_____ actions).
The CNS, consisting of the brain and spinal cord, processes _____ and coordinates responses.
The nervous system is divided into two major parts: the central nervous system (CNS) and the _____ nervous system (PNS).
